content: lamb s pride wool mittens - using four needles created by marlene ableiter adapted for dpns by alaina privette requires one skein of bulky lamb s pride wool with barely any left over four double point size 8 knitting needles yarn darning needle and two stitch markers cast on 30 stitches divide the stitches evenly between three needles ribbed cuff knit 1 purl 1 each row until two inch cuff is obtained row 1 knit around row row 2 knit 1 purl 1 - around row repeat row 1 and 2 two more times row 3 thumb gusset knit 15 stitches place marker knit 1 stitch between the next stitch on previous row go down one row place second marker knit remaining 15 stitches row 4 knit 1 purl 1 for 15 stitches slip marker knit 1 slip second marker purl 1 knit 1 for next 15 stitches row 5 knit 15 slip marker increase to make increase knit 1 in front stitch then knit 1 in back of same stitch slip marker you now have 2 stitches for thumb knit next 15 stitches row 6 knit 1 purl 1 on 15 stitches slip marker knit 2 stitches slip marker purl 1 knit 1 for remaining 15 stitches row 7 knit 15 slip marker increase in both stitches slip marker knit next 15 stitches 4 stitches for thumb row 8 knit 1 purl 1 on 15 stitches slip marker knit thumb stitches slip marker purl 1 knit 1 for remaining 15 stitches row 9 knit 15 slip marker increase in first stitch knit across increase in last stitch slip marker knit next 15 stitches row 10 knit 1 purl 1 on 15 stitches slip marker knit thumb stitches slip marker purl 1 knit 1 for remaining 15 stitches *repeat row 9 and 10 until you have 14 stitches between markers when you have 14 stitches between markers and have knit around… next row knit 1 purl 1 first 15 stitches slip thumb gusset onto a stitch holder or piece of waste yarn purl 1 knit 1 remaining 15 stitches next row a knit all 30 stitches next row b knit 1 purl 1 all 30 stitches continue row a and row b pattern until the mitten reaches ½ of desired length about 26 rounds i go to the tip of my fingertips top decrease next row *knit 2 together knit 1 and repeat from * across row 20 stitches next row knit around next row knit 2 together *knit 1 knit 2 together repeat from * across 13 stitches next row knit around cut yarn leaving an 8 inch tail with darning needles run the yarn through the remaining 13 stitches and pull tight weave end in thumb pick up all stitches on thumb holder arranging the stitches around the needles attach yarn at bridge area knit around place marker if desired to note beginning of round knit 12 rounds or desired length thumb decrease next row
